GOA

GOA was the video games division of France Telecom's Orange. I was fortunate enough to work with a group of talented designers and illustrators the year I spent in Dublin, Ireland. My work included design of user interfaces and promotional material (wallpaper, banners, backgrounds) for the online multiplayer casual golf simulation game — PangYa.

Wallpaper

Downloadable wallpaper helped promote new seasonal characters and heighten visibility of the game.

Banners

I designed banners for monthly PangYa golf competitions displayed on the GOA website to promote engagement.

Prototypes
